title: Development of Online Social Education Courses Through Participatory Observation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental social studies knowledge and adaptability to online learning environments
context.additional_context: A public social education program for in-service professionals, where participants learn through experiential collaborative content development using participatory observation methods

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three-stage online instructional design process (planning-production-evaluation) with 80% accuracy
Learners can draft educational content using collaborative tools (chat, whiteboard, file sharing) in a VR simulation environment
Through project-based assessment, learners develop and present educational simulation scenarios for solving real-world social problems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
